vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.11.2;
daughter of: Jehoram (H3088) and Athaliah (H6271);
sister of: Ahaziah (H0274H); married to Jehoiada (H3077H); also called Jehoshabeath at 2Ch.22.11;
Another name of ye.ho.she.va (יְהוֹשֶׁבַע "Jehosheba" H3089)
§ Jehoshabeath = "Jehovah is an oath"
1) daughter of king Joram of Judah and wife of the high priest Jehoiada
1a) alternate spelling 'Jehosheba- ye.ho.she.va (יְהוֹשֶׁבַע "Jehosheba" H3089)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約示巴 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華是誓約"
1) 猶大王約蘭的女兒, 大祭司耶何耶大的妻子 #代下 22:11|
1a) 或拼作 Jehosheba [03089]
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约示巴 这个阴性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华是誓约"
1) 犹大王约兰的女儿, 大祭司耶何耶大的妻子 #代下 22:11|
1a) 或拼作 Jehosheba [03089]
